data.name: The Cecil: The Journey Begins
data.detailed_description:
Experience survival horror with this brand new installment of - The Cecil: The Journey Begins.

First-Person Action – Players take on the role of Jeff Chambers and experience a spine chilling battle of terrifying pursuit through dark hallways a first-person perspective.

Scary and unusual foes: get up close and personal with creepy monsters and tall metal screamers lurking in the halls, leaving you terrified around every corner.

Fast-paced gameplay: Fight enemies in shooter-style battles, explore dangerous rooms, solve fast-paced puzzles to get to new areas, and use things in the world to escape your fate.

High-Resolution Environments - High resolution environments with adjustable settings

Full controller support -  Use a standard USB controller to play.
data.about_the_game:
Experience survival horror with this brand new installment of - The Cecil: The Journey Begins.

data.short_description: “Cecil” is a survival horror-based game about the mysteries of the famous Cecil hotel, but with a twist. Explore the hotel and find out about the mysteries and untold stories that lie within the halls of horror.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 (64 bit)
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 3 1200 ／ Intel Core i5-7500
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon RX 560 with 4GB VRAM ／ NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050 Ti with 4GB VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 (64 bit)
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 5 3600 ／ Intel Core i7 8700
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon RX 5700 ／ NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1070
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 10 MB available space

content_descriptors.notes: This Game may contain content not appropriate for all ages, or may not be appropriate for viewing at work: Violence or Gore, General Mature Content
